attributes.action: Unfair Payments, C.S.A Change Their Name and Take More!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Goverment admitted late 2006 to Parlimant the C.S.A is a shambles!!!!! and requested the C.S.A be Revamped, but Farthers are still being treated UNFAIR under the new system, MY ASSESMENT IN BRIEF,I am a hard working man and travel 300 miles per week to and from work and on a month to month basis it costs me £220-00 to get to work and they gave me an allowance to travel to work on a week to week basis of £7.80,plus taking a 3rd of my wages before TAX and INSURANCE which leaves me with £200.00 a month to live on for the rest of the month to pay RENT, COUNCIL TAX AND FOOD AND CLOTHING AND OTHER ECT ECT is this fair ??????

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions for the CSA:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=csa
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
